description:
Byakuya Kuchiki may have been impressed by the power exerted by Ichigo, the substitute Soul Reaper, but he`s not done fighting yet. With spiritual pressure shaking the entire Seireitei, Orihime, Chad, Uryu, and Ganju wait helplessly nearby, knowing that all they can do is hope that their friend Ichigo will survive this vicious battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion du match mortel, fierté blanche et désir noir
Conclusion of the Battle! White Pride and Black Thoughts
Shitou Kecchaku! Shiroki Hokori to Kuroki Omoi
死闘決着! 白き誇りと黒き想い
